Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.collisions

Interface Collider

All Superinterfaces:
Bounded, DimensionsProvider, DirectionProvider, GameNode, SpeedProvider
public interface Collider
extends Bounded, SpeedProvider, DirectionProvider
A Collider represents an YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a Collided

In case of a collision, only the Collided will be notified.
